explains: n. 帕拉（南斯拉夫币）；帕拉胶

sentences.en: The adhesion mechanism of para-disubstitution phenolic adhesives for rubber and polyester cords is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出了酚醛粘胶剂粘合橡胶和聚酯绳的机理。

sentences.en: The chemical name for dioxin is: 2,3,7,8- tetrachlorodibenzo para dioxin (TCDD).
sentences.cn: 二恶英的化学名叫：2，3，7，8-四氯二苯并对二恶英（TCDD）。
